articles.author: Andrea Vacchiano
articles.title: STD rates skyrocket among Americans 55 and older: CDC - Fox News
articles.description: STD rates among Americans aged 55 and older have skyrocketed since 2012, according to the CDC. Chlamydia, Hepatitis C, and syphilis were among the diseases listed.
articles.content:
Sexually transmitted disease rates have risen sharply in a certain age group and which group it is may surprise you.
The CDC's latest statistics on STDs in the U.S. show that chlamydia, Hepatitis C,… [+1867 chars]
